thread.title: Second annual California Theater Sci-Fi Horror festival
thread.title_full: Second annual California Theater Sci-Fi Horror festival

title: Second annual California Theater Sci-Fi Horror festival
text: Second annual California Theater Sci-Fi Horror festival Comment Mount Shasta Herald - Mount Shasta, CA Writer Posted Oct. 14, 2015 at 11:13 AM Posted Oct. 14, 2015 at 11:13 AM The second annual California Theater Sci-Fi Horror festival is going to kick off with a zombie walk on Friday, Oct. 23. Zombies should meet in front of the California Theater in Dunsmuir at 5 p.m. After assembling at the theater, zombies will invade Dunsmuir for a walk downtown. Prizes will be given out to best zombies in each age group category: sixth grade and under, junior high, high school and adult. The Sci-Fi Horror Festival will start off with a weekend of sci-fi films Oct. 23-25. Horror films will be shown Oct. 30-31. For more information, call 530-925-4020. For information about movies and showtimes at the California Theater, visit their Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/dunsmuircaliforniatheatre Mount Shasta Herald - Mount Shasta, CA Writer
